QuestData.Title: Forming the Scroll
QuestData.Description: For this plan to work, we'll need infused parchment.$B$BThe latent arcane energy at this nexus quickly froze the ancients in place and settled in their bark.$B$BIf we rip off strips from the few that haven't been destroyed by the fungal creatures, I can form them into parchment.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rip $1oa Pieces of Bark off of Slumbering Ancients in Zangarra.
QuestData.RewardText: Such clean breaks on each piece! Fantastic.
